attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many councils are now "blanket" setting speed limits to 50mph in what were previously national speed limits zones (60mph), even though no accident history etc.
It seems that the national / current speed limts are now being reduced by 10mph all over the country.

We want the government to stop this and only reduce speed limits in areas where it would be of benefit

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
